about_the_game:
This soundtrack for Paper Bride 6 Nightmare includes two original, Chinese-style compositions from the game, along with their instrumental versions:

Theme Song: "The Village You Left": A bold new experiment in style, this gentle yet sorrowful melody captures the thousand-year nightmare and the unspoken love lingering within.

Interlude: "Boddhisattva of Death, Thousand Faces": Centered around the suona, with additional instrumentation and chanting, this powerful “soul-guiding song” conveys sorrow and strength. Does it bring you the tension of battle?

The soundtrack features lossless audio of original master quality in WAV format at a bitrate of 2304 kbps.

The story of Paper Bride continues, and we’ll see you in the next chapter.
